review_title: Well organized company, it's been an enlightening experience
job_title: Graphic Designer in Athens, Athens, Attica
pros: Professional attitude. Gives you perspective about NGOs and social consciousness. Matching tasks based on your skills. Self-developing experience. I was their first graphic designer but we finished many tasks together with perfect organization.
cons: Office location. The neighborhood can be tricky. But the office and the building is perfect!

review_title: Friendly and Collaborative Place to Work!
job_title: Graphic Design Intern in Athens, Athens, Attica
